thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com | 13 of 1307
thread.title: Kason Wan
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Kason Wan

author: Kason Wan
title: Kason Wan
text: I have never had an issue here. The staff is knowledgeable and always looking out for your best interest in terms of price and what tires/services are best for your vehicle. Only two things I wish were better are the location of stores and text notifications. I spend a majority of the year in New York and wish there were some stores there. I also sometimes do not receive texts when service is completed on my car. Other than those, A+ service!
